"Throw a Shakespeare novel against the wall saying it has completely pulled the rug from under me - that is education" Dr. Cornell West. #in
"Apology of Socrates is one of the greatest literary feats. I am going to my death for my speech which I'm willing to die for." Dr. West #in
"1 in 4 corporations don't pay a penny in income tax while the middle class pays 21%, 25%, 30%" Dr. Cornell West. #in
In the newspaper "It's no accident there is a business page and no labor page" Dr. Cornell West. #in
"To be human is to spread love to the orphaned, impoverished, struggling, and sick" Dr. Cornell West. #in
"Be an eagle - soar and keep an eye on the people below" Dr. Cornell West. #in
"In America everyone is for sell" Dr. Cornell West. #in
"There would be no democracy if it wasn't for the mistreatment of our indigenous brothers and siters" Dr. Cornell West. #in
"When you give up some predjudices and presuppositions that is a form of death." Dr. Cornell West.
"I believe every young person is valuable, I don't care what percent they're in" Dr. Cornell West. #in
"Schools are dilapidated; there are 684 public schools in Chicago and only 1 in 4 have an arts and music program" Dr. West. #in
"0.2% of all campaigning has been about poverty" Dr. Cornell West. #in
Weapons of mass distraction, corporate media, and the dumbing down of public discourse are all major societal issues for Dr. West.
"What kind of virtues do we really have?... All about myself and the 11th amendment - thou shall not get caught" Dr. Cornell West. #in
"One third of Blacks are locked up in the new Jim Crow." Dr. Cornell West. #in
"No special interest group articulation wants justice for everyone even if it starts on the chocolate side of town." Dr. Cornell West #in
"People always have the power to fight back" Dr. Cornell West. #in
"Will you simply attain affluence to easily adapt to injustice?!" Dr. Cornell West. #in
"I am who I am because someone loved me. You are who you are because someone loved you" Dr. Cornell West.
"Dr. King's 3 evils are: poverty, racism, and militarism" Dr. Cornell West. #in

"First of all Gov. Romney is going to have a busy first day in office bc he's also going to repeal Obamacare." Obama #debates
"It wasn't very detailed, which seems to be a recurring theme." Obama on Romney's statement. #debates
"No, I had 5 seconds before you interrupted me." Obama #debates
"And we have to have a President that can reach across the aisle." Romney #debates
"Is Governer Romney hiding these plans because they're too good? No." Obama #debates
"Let me tell you what Obamacare did. 1. It let you keep your coverage, you don't get jerked around." Obama #debates
"Donald Trump is a small business and I don't think Mr. Trump considers himself small anything." Obama #debates

"So what did we do? We stepped in and had the toughest reform on Wall Street since the 1930's." Obama #debates
"No, let's not. Let's let him respond to your statement." Moderator to Romney #debates
"Does anyone think Exxon needs a little extra money?" Obama #debates
Does Romney ever stop grinning?? #debates
"We're now spending 42% of our economy on goverment." Romney #debates
"You've been President four years but you have not reduced our deficit by half which you promised." Romney #debates
"When I took office, we had a trillion dollar deficit and we all know where it came from." Obama #debates
"I would get rid of Obamacare, I'm sorry President I use that term with respect and affection." Romney #debates
"The problem with cutting taxes hurts growth, I advocate cutting spending." Romney #debates
"My plan is to put more people back in work, people are struggling." Romney #debates
"I'm not in favor of a $5 trillion tax cut, but that's not my plan." Romney #debates
